methods.name: init
methods.description: Provides authentication based on the provided OAuth2 configurations.

returnParameters.description: Received OAuth2 access token or else an `oauth2:Error` if an error occurred

methods.name: generateToken
methods.description:
Get an OAuth2 access token from the authorization server.
```ballerina
string token = check provider.generateToken();
```

initMethod.name: init
initMethod.description: Provides authentication based on the provided OAuth2 configurations.

returnParameters.description: Received OAuth2 access token or else an `oauth2:Error` if an error occurred

otherMethods.description:
Get an OAuth2 access token from the authorization server.
```ballerina
string token = check provider.generateToken();
```

classes.name: ClientOAuth2Provider
classes.description:
Represents the client OAuth2 provider, which is used to generate OAuth2 access tokens using the configured OAuth2
authorization server configurations. This supports the client credentials grant type, password grant type, and the
refresh token grant type.

1. Client Credentials Grant Type
```ballerina
oauth2:ClientOAuth2Provider provider = new({
    tokenUrl: "https://localhost:9196/oauth2/token",
    clientId: "3MVG9YDQS5WtC11paU2WcQjBB3L",
    clientSecret: "9205371918321623741",
    scopes: ["token-scope1", "token-scope2"]
});
```

2. Password Grant Type
```ballerina
oauth2:ClientOAuth2Provider provider = new({
    tokenUrl: "https://localhost:9196/oauth2/token/authorize/header",
    username: "johndoe",
    password: "A3ddj3w",
    clientId: "3MVG9YDQS5WtC11paU2WcQjBB3L",
    clientSecret: "9205371918321623741",
    scopes: ["token-scope1", "token-scope2"]
});
```

3. Refresh Token Grant Type
```ballerina
oauth2:ClientOAuth2Provider provider = new({
    refreshUrl: "https://localhost:9196/oauth2/token/refresh",
    refreshToken: "XlfBs91yquexJqDaKEMzVg==",
    clientId: "3MVG9YDQS5WtC11paU2WcQjBB3L",
    clientSecret: "9205371918321623741",
    scopes: ["token-scope1", "token-scope2"]
});
```

methods.name: init
methods.description: Provides authentication based on the provided introspection configurations.

parameters.name: credential
parameters.description: OAuth2 access token to be authenticated

parameters.name: optionalParams
parameters.description: Map of optional parameters used for the introspection endpoint

returnParameters.description: An `oauth2:IntrospectionResponse` if the authentication is successful or else an `oauth2:Error` if an error occurred

methods.name: authorize
methods.description:
Authenticates the provided OAuth2 acess token against the introspection endpoint.
```ballerina
boolean result = check provider.authenticate("<credential>");
```

classes.name: ListenerOAuth2Provider

errors.name: Error
errors.description:
Represents the error type of the module. This will be returned if an error occurred while the listener OAuth2 provider
tries to authenticate the received credentials and the client OAuth2 provider tries to generate the token.

types.name: ClientAuth
types.description: Represents the the authentication configuration types for the HTTP client used for token introspection.

types.name: GrantConfig
types.description: Represents the grant type configurations supported for OAuth2.

modules.summary: This module provides a framework for interacting with OAuth2 authorization servers as specified in the "RFC 6749" (https://datatracker.ietf.org/doc/html/rfc6749) and "RFC 7662" (https://datatracker.ietf.org/doc/html/rfc7662).
modules.description:
## Overview

This module provides a framework for interacting with OAuth2 authorization servers as specified in the [RFC 6749](https://datatracker.ietf.org/doc/html/rfc6749) and [RFC 7662](https://datatracker.ietf.org/doc/html/rfc7662).

The OAuth 2.0 authorization framework enables a third-party application to obtain limited access to an HTTP service either on behalf of a resource owner by orchestrating an approval interaction between the resource owner and the HTTP service or by allowing the third-party application to obtain access on its own behalf.

The Ballerina `oauth2` module facilitates auth providers that are to be used by the clients and listeners of different protocol connectors.

### Listener OAuth2 Provider

Represents the listener OAuth2 provider, which is used to validate the received credential (access token) by calling the configured OAuth2 introspection server.

### Client OAuth2 Provider

Represents the client OAuth2 provider, which is used to generate OAuth2 access tokens using the configured OAuth2 authorization server configurations. This supports the client credentials grant type, password grant type, and refresh token grant type.
This module provides a framework for interacting with OAuth2 authorization servers as specified in the "RFC 6749" (https://datatracker.
